title: Inside look at FSA Metron 45, 60 SL wheels – more aero with 28mm tires & faster, lighter hubs
content:
The new FSA Metron 45 and 60 SL wheelsets get updated aerodynamic rim profiles optimized for 28mm tires, plus new PRS helical ratchet hubs that are not only lighter, but way faster to engage. But that’s not the only benefit to the new design… Coming in tubular and tubeless clincher options, we covered all of

The post Inside look at FSA Metron 45, 60 SL wheels – more aero with 28mm tires & faster, lighter hubs appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
